div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio xixo
die octobris Anno quo supra

The samyn day it was deliuerit be ane Suorne
assis' thomas mar' forspekar for the eschevin of
skath and trubule in tyme to Cum that gif euir the videw
of nichole baxtar or thomas buchane baxtar offendis
tile vthir and beis conuikit tharintile sal pay to Sanct
nicholes werk x s' vnforgevin to giddir with ane
amendis to the party

The samyn day comperit Androw glendynvin and thomas
bard' tua of the frauchtismen of ane Schip callit
the nicholes with vthiris merchandis of the samyn and follouit
and persevit thomas bard mastir and gouernor' vndir gode of the samyn
for the wranguis' haldin of thar gudis and merchandice
within his said Schipe thai beinge redy to pay the
fraucht of the samyn Ande the said thomas mastir denyit
that the he awche to deliuer the said' gudis vnto the tyme
the said Schipe come to the port of leithe eftir the tenouris
of the chartir party maid betuix tham tharapon And in continent
the said action' was put to the decisione of thir personis
vndir writin chosin and suorne in ane assis' with bath thar
consentis that is to say thomas prat thomas mar thomas
Waus Jhone colisone thomsone Jonhne menyeis Richerd'
Waus Robert rede henry hourum Jonhne fechat burges
of the said burghe James martyne Robert betsone of Disert and
Sandris Carmechile in Denmerke quhilkis riplie
avisit the richtis and resonis' of bath the said' partiis herd
and vndirstandin deliuerit and ordanit be the moutht of
the said' thomas prat that the said mastir sal deliuer to
the said' frauchtismen and merchandis thar' gudis beinge
within the said Schipe and thai to pay him the frauchtis
of the samyn becaus' thai fand' the said' schip nocht
sufficient and hir' Stherisman left hir

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio
eiusdem xxjo die Octobris anno quo supra

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane assis' William
blinsel forspekar that thomas rolland' sal pay to Androw
Culan yongar xxj s' to morne or the sone gang to and
falyeing tharof the said androw sal gif him ix s' and he sal
deliuer him ij barrelis of tar'

the said day the ballieis assignit this day xv dais to J'J' overwrites 'A'.hon'
blak to ansuer to the borghe strekit one him be William
gareauche for the wranguis' haldin fra him of vij li' scottis
money to compt and rekning

Eodem die Willelmus gareauche senior fecit constituit creauit
et nominauit Willelmum blinsel suum legittimum procuratorem ad prosequendum ple
gium per ipsum super ip Johannem blak porrectum pro iniusta detencione
ab eo summe Septem li' monete scocie ad iustum Calculum agendum
defendendum promitten' de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij
cum omnibus clausulis necessariis et oportunis

Eodem die Johannes malisone fecit constituit creauit ordinauit
dominum matheum nicholsone suum legittimum verum et Indubitatum
procuratorem actorem factorem ad assedandum terras suas vniuersas
infra dictum burgum Jacentes et firmas earundem leuand' ad comodum
suum et heredum suorum agendum prosequendum et defendendum de receptis
acquitandis promitten' de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij
cum terminis necessariis et oportunis

The samyn day Robert goyne flessar' was conuikit be ane Suorne
assis' Williame blinsele forspekar for the Strubulance of
Williame lammyntone for the quhilkis he was ordanit to
pay demi li' of waxe to the haly blud' licht Ande gif euire
he committis ony Strubulance tile ony persone in tyme to cum
he sal pay xl s' to Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin

The saide day comperit Jonhne menyeis and schew how
he oft tymes bigane hed' offerit him redy to resaue the
malys of the said' burghe' of martimes and Witsonday bigan
Ande thane offerit him redy to resaue In his nayme
and vthiris his fallowis balyeis of the yer' bigan the malis
of the saide burghe' and to keip ale thame that maid'
him haile pament of thar' malys skathles of the
samyn protestand' gif ony Skatht happinis apone
tham suld' turne him and his fallowis to nay preiudice
considerand' it was in thar' defalte as he allegitis

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxv die
octobris anno quo supra

the saide day philp quhithede was in Amerciament of the court for
the wranguis' strubulance of thomas bard and the said' thomas
in amerciament of the courte for the wranguis' strubulance of the said'
philp And' atour thai ordanit the said' philp to cum one
Sonday that next cumis with ane candile contening j li' waxe
In tyme of the hie mes' and bringe with him his knyf dravin
and halde it be the poynt and deliuer it to the said thomas
ande ask him forgevnes and besek the worthie men present
for the tyme tile pray the saide thomas to remitt him
the offens' done to him and offir the said' candile to the
haly blude licht / Ande Jonhne menyeis come Souerte
for the saide philp to the fulfilling of the said' deliuerance

Eodem die Johannes menyeis deuenit plegius legalis quod
thomas barde erit Indempnis pro philippo quhithede et
parte sua aliter quam per viam reg iuris Et Johannes Culan
deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus philippus erit Indempnis pro
dicto thoma et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris Et quelibet
dictarum parcium obligatur ad releuandum suos plegios de huiusmodi fide
iussione

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
secundo die nouembris Anno quo supra

The saide day Johnhe of tulidef was conuikit be ane Suorne
assis' Thomas prat forspekar for the wranguis' trubulance
of philp of Dunbrek and to amend' to him as law wile and
forbeir in tyme to cum

The saide day Jonhne mentetht and Jonhne Watsone was conuikit
for trubulance of philp Dunbrek be ane Suorne assis' the
said' thomas prat forspekar

The saide day Jonhne mentetht was conuikit be ane Suorne
assis' for trubulance of the court be ane Suorne assis' the
said' thomas forspekar

The saide day Jonhne Colisone become Souerte tile entir Jonhne
tulidef within this tolbutht befor the aldirman and balyeis one
monunday cum xv dais for the Amendismakinge to philp Dunbrek
officiar' for the offens' and trubulinge of him

Eodem die Johannes Colisone deuenit plegius legalis quod philip
pus Dunbrek erit Indempnis pro Johanne Tulidef et parte
sua aliter quam per viam iuris Et Richardus Waus deuenit
plegius legalis quod dictus phillipus erit Indempnis pro
Johanne mentetht et Johanne Watsone et parte sua aliter quam
per viam iuris Et gilbertus menyeis deuenit plegius legalis
quod dicti Johannes tulidef Johannes mentetht et Johannes Watsone
erunt Indempnes pro dicto philippo et parte sua aliter quam
per viam Juris Et quelibet dictarum parcium obligatur per manus
ad releuandum suos plegios de huiusmodi fideiussione

The saide day Richerd Waus become Souerte to Entir
Jonhne mentetht and Jonhne Watsone befor the aldirman and
balyeis within this tolbutht one monunday cum xv dais
for the amendis making to philp Dunbrek for the offens'
done to him and the saide Jonhne mentetht for the Amendis
making for the trubulance of the Court'

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
quarto die nouembris Anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman balyeis and consale and communite
present for the tyme grantit thame avand' to thomas
prat xlviij s' and to Williame futhes xlviij s' Scottis
money for spice waxe and wyne gevin tile our Souerane
lordez propine quhilkis thai oblist tham tile allow in
thar grissomez' gif the assedacion' beis maid' within
tua yeris next hereftir Ande falyeinge tharof thai
grantit and oblist thame to refunde content and pay
to the saide thomas xlviij s' and to the said' William
xlviij s' but fraude or gile And' thankit thame
gretlie of thar first and Supersedement of the said' money
to the redschipe of the towne

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quinto die
mensis nouembris Anno quo supra

Eodem die Alexander prat in Amerciamento Curie per confessionem propriam pro perturbio
Andree lammyntone cuj emendabit vt iura volunt Insuper dictus
Alexander amerciatur per assisam pro perturbio Willelmj lammyntone Cuj emendabit
vt supra

Eodem die Willelmus lammyntone quitus de perturbio Alexandri prat per
assisam

Eodem die Willelmus lammyntone deuenit plegius legalis quod Alexander prat
erit Indempnis pro Andrea lammyntone et parte sua aliter quam per viam
iuris Et Idem Andreas deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Alexander erit Indempnis
pro dicto Willelmo et parte sua aliter quam per viam iurus Et Thomas
prat deuenit plegius legalis quod dicti Andreas et Willelmus erunt Indempnes
pro dicto Alexandro et parte sua aliter quod per viam Juris Et quelibet
dictarum obligatur per manus et bona ad conseruandum plegios suos indempnes
de huiusmodi fideiussione

Eodem die georgius Corntone opidanus de leithe fecit
constituit creauit et nominauit Johannem low et Johannem chapman suos
procuratores legittimos coniunctim et diuisim ad prosequendum petendum et recipiendum
mensas ligna vidus le wrak Cimbe sue naufragat' alias
infra portum de Abirdene et in aliis actionibus et querelis
ipsum concernentibus et tangen' detinen' prosequend' calumpniand'
agend' et defendend' de receptis acquitendis cum pacto
de ulterius non petend' promitten' de Rato et grato
in vberiore forma procuratorij cum omnibus terminis necessariis et
oportunis Testibus Alexandro menyeis Johanne Waus patricio
Red' et Roberto Kintore

Curia balliuorum tenta in futy vijo die nouembris
anno quo supra

The saide day Williame lyntone and his sex botmen
Alexander ryne and his sex boytmen Jonhne matheson his
sex botmen Thome kenyow his sex botmen Ingeram lidale
his sex botmen Richerd falconer his sex botmen and Johne
nicholsone and his Sex botmen' Ilkan of thame in
ane amerciament of the court for the wranguis' Sellinge of
fische at the schoir' or thai present the mercat / Alsua Ilkan
of tham in amerciament of the court for the occupeinge of fremennis craft
Saltand fische except' William lyntone quhilkis is freman
Alsua Ilkan of tham in Amerciament of the court for the sellinge of fische
tile vnfremen or the tone be seruit And' Ilkan of the said personis
except William lyntone Allan Sthevinson and William taytis
conuikit be the saide assis' Jonhne colisone forspekar be caus'
thai wald' nocht pas' apone the Schipis for the profit of the tone
quhen thai war chargit for siclik revard' as the tone was
wont to gif

This sade ball
The saide day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' John
colisone forspekar that Jonhne Westlande sale content and pay
to sere Jonhne of Striueling sex s' and viij d' for his
taverne maile of the Witsonday terme bigane

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem octauo die
nouembris anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis assignit monunday cum xv
dais to Androu Culan eldar to ansuer to the borghe' strekit
one him be Androw murray eldar for the wranguis' haldin fra him
of viij markis of the grissome of his thridparte nethis fischingis
of Done

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane assis' Robert blinsele
forspekar that Thomas rolland' sal pay to the aldirman and balyeis
ij markis for his demi nethis fischingis of the furdis of this fischinge
last bigan

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio
eiusdem ix die nouembris anno quo supra

The saide day it was Statute and ordanit be the
aldirman and consal present for the tyme that the baxtaris
sal bak tua penny brede gude and cleyne stuf wele
bakin weing' xxxtj vnce Ilkan layf for ij d' and
penny brede weing xv vnce Ande gif ony refus'
to bak of the said' pace thai salbe secludit the
baking' quhile michaelmes day next to Cum

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xv die nouembris anno quo supra

The saide say Jonhne rossale masone was conducit and hirit be
the aldirman and consale for ane yer' to remane and abid'
in thar seruice batht in the luge and vteuthe and pas' to cowe
quhen he is chargit one his avne expens' thar to hew
and wirk at ale his pouer' to the Stuff and bigyne of
Sanct the queir' and kirk werk for the quhilkis seruice
lelely and treulie to be done the saide Jonhne deponit the
gret aithe Ande thai sal pay to the saide Jonhne xx merkis
vsual money of Scotlande of fee for his saide yeris seruice
alanerly but ale accidentis of the brede and vthiris

the saide day Alexander stute thomas barry and mathow Wricht
masonis' was conducit and hirit be the aldirman ande consale
for ane yer to remane and abide in thar seruice batht in the
luge and vteuthe ande pas' to Cowe thar to hew and wirk
one thar avne expens' for the Stuf and bigyne of thar
kirk werke and thai haue Suorne the gret bodely aithe
to do thar saide seruice and werk for this yer for the quhilkis
thai sal pay to Ilkane of the saide masonis' xx merkis vsual
money of Scotlande alanerlie but al accidentis bofof brede

the saide day Jonhne Waus in the greyne come dettour
be his hande vphaldin to pay tile Androw murray eldar tua
barrellis of Salmond' sufficient merchand' gude at mydsommir
day next eftir follouing or within xv dais thareftir vnrepreuit
or ane demi nethis fischingis of the furdis Sett to patrik
rede for ane yer' Ande the said patrik oblist him be his
hand and gudis to freithe and releywe the said' Jonhne of the
said' ij barrelis Salmond'

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xviijo
die nouembris Anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis ordanit Androw
nachty to warne thome Waus to comper befor tham
one Settirday that next cumis to ansuer to the borghe strekit
one him be gilbert Waus of many for the wranguis' haldin
fra him of Sex s' and viij d' of maile

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio
eiusdem xxijo die nouembris anno quo supra

the saide day the aldirman assignit to William yonge
for the kepin of the ferdinge xx s' left be James
andirson to the kirk werk and demi merk of part of the
thinge left be vmquhile Wil fywe Jonhne thomson to the said'
werk

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Robert
blinsele forspekar that thomas mar' is avand' viij s' to
Richerd' Waus quhilkis the balyeis ordanit him to pay
within terme of law

The saide day the aldirman diuers' of the consale and communite present for the tyme
for the bigin reformacion and vphaldin of thar commone knok in the
tolbutht grantit to Dauid theman goldsmytht fourtj s' of the thre
buthtis vndir the tolbutht quhile the next generale assedacion and
thane thai grantit him ane demi nethis fischingis of the furdis maile
and grissome fre to him and his assignay and ane mark of ane of
the saide buthtis yerlie and to be taxt fre ffor the quhilkis
the said Dauid and his assignay sale deulie bige reforme and
vphald ther said knok be sicht of the tone as efferis

Curia balliuorum legalis de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
ix die mensis Decembris Anno quo supra

The saide day comperit patrik ros' and margaret fechat
his spous' befor the aldirman and balyeis as day assignit
to thame one that ane parte Ande Jonhne lammyntone one
that vthir parte anent ane annuele Rent of xxiij s' And' in
continent the saide Jhone' presentit ane lettir of our Souerane lordis
to the aldirman and balyeis to cal the saide partiis befor thame
and minster Justice equaly to batht the partiis herfor the aldirman
ande balyeis assignit the law day eftir yule to the said partiis
and warnit tham to be thar the saide day and thai suld' minster
iustice equaly to the partiis forsaid' In the premiss'

The saide day thome Walcar grantit him resavit fra the wyf
of Jonhne cove xj elne of raw brone gray clath quhilkis he has
allegit was stollin nocht withstandin he grantit to pay the
vale of the samyn clath be estimacion of mene of knawlege
and it coud' nocht be gottin

The samyn day Dauid mar' balye assignit the law day eftir
yule to Jonhne andirsone to Cum and se the richtis that Androw
branche has to the haldin of the maile of ane butht ande
ane Sellar' for the balye allegit that the said' Androw hed' promittit
to him to schew his richtis the saide day

The said' day Androu barkar' be his avne tonge grant was
In amerciament of the court becaus' he raid' nocht with the Abbat of
bonay corde

The saide day the balyeis assignit the law day eftir yule
to Alexander gardin to preyf ane rede tuschay siluerit his
beinge within the handis of Androu hall wobstar'

the saide day Androw litstar was conuikit be his avne grant
becaus' he raid' nocht with the Abbat of bonacord'

The saide day thome Wentone was conuikit for the
forstallinge of the burghe In byinge of Skinnis

The saide day T philp Dunbrek officiar' at commavnd'
of the aldirman and balyeis chargit be his wand Androw lammyn
tone to remane within the tolbutht quhil he pait the somez'
contenit in the akis of the buk

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xxiij die Decembris anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis assignit the law
day eftir yule to Androw Culane eldar to ansuer' to the
borghe strekit one him be Androw murray eldar for the
wranguis' haldin fra him of viij merkis for the grissome
of his thridpart nethis fischingis of Done

The saide day the aldirman and the balyes assignit the law
day eftir yule to gilbert riburne to ansuer' for his wif
to the borghe strekit one hir for the wranguis' haldin
of x s' fra Jonhne of chamer for j barrel of malt

The saide day Alexander sclatar come borghe' be his hande
and gudis to Jonhne Sanclar' for xij s' and j d' Scottis money
to be pait at fasterinewin for Alexander Watsone his fadir

Nono die Januarij anno quo supra Johannes Culane fecit consti
tuit creauit et solempniter ordinauit franciscum Culan suum
fratrem germanum suum legittimum procuratorem ad petendum et recipiendum a victaleone
opidano de Weris quinque barellis salmonum sibi debitis vt asseruit
et de receptis acquitand' Et si mente fuerit eundem prosequend'
agend' defendend' litiscontestand' Et generaliter omnia alia et singula
faciend' et cetera promitten' de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij
cum omnibus terminis ad procuratorem necessariis et oportunis
